welendasala pariksha kirime di 2009 wasare di kal ikuth wu thawath pani bima bothal wishala pramanayak ehi thibi polisiya barayata gena atha.saukhya amathyanshaya wisin pasugiya sikurada me siddhiyata adalawa ema bima nishpadanaya kala biyagama karmanthashalawa parikshawata lak kara thibe.miya giya daruwage piya wisin gena ena lada pani bima bothalaya panaya kirimen pasu daruwa miyagos mawa barapathala lesa rogathura wi thibe.ema bima wargaya paribhogikaya athata path nowana lesa ratapura athi welendasalwalin iwathkara palath saukhya sewa niladharinge barayata ganna lesa saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha adala niladharinta upades di thibe.bima wargaye sampala kihipayak ada (21) dina rajaye rasa parikshakawaraya wetha wadidura parikshana sandaha idiripath kere..
